summary: Frontend testing completed for new Financial Health features. All 12 features tested and working correctly for both FREE and TRIAL/PREMIUM users.

ui_bugs.issue: Nested button warning - HelpTooltip (button) inside Button component causes HTML validation warning
ui_bugs.note: Does not affect functionality, only console warning

action_items: OPTIONAL: Fix nested button in WhatChanged.jsx by moving HelpTooltip outside the Button component
critical_code_review_comments: FinancialHealthSnapshot.jsx: Well implemented with FREE core metrics (Savings Rate, Net Cash Flow, Budget Status) and Premium enhancements (trends, investment performance, smart insights)
HelpTooltip.jsx: Clean implementation with comprehensive financial term definitions
SmartAlerts.jsx: Properly locked for free users, unlocked with toggle for premium/trial users
WhatChanged.jsx: Good period comparison feature, minor nested button issue
PricingPage.jsx: Data Export correctly removed from premium features list
AccessContext.jsx: SMART_ALERTS and WHAT_CHANGED correctly added to premium features
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new dashboard features tested and working. Features verified: 1) Financial Health Snapshot with FREE metrics and Premium enhancements, 2) Help Tooltips for financial terms, 3) Smart Alerts with toggle for premium users, 4) What Changed comparison for premium users, 5) Data Export removed from pricing page, 6) Investment Portfolio PRO badge for free users.

free_user_features: Financial Health Snapshot shows Savings Rate, Net Cash Flow, Budget Status ✅
Help tooltips (?) icons appear next to Savings Rate, Net Cash Flow, Budget Status ✅
Savings Rate tooltip shows definition with formula ✅
Net Cash Flow tooltip shows definition ✅
Budget Status tooltip shows definition with thresholds ✅
Locked 'Unlock trends, investment insights' teaser with Premium badge ✅
Smart Alerts section locked with Premium badge ✅
What Changed button locked with Premium badge ✅
Investment Portfolio shows PRO badge for free users ✅
premium_trial_user_features: Quote of the Day visible and unlocked ✅
Trend indicators (+26.9% vs last month) in Financial Health ✅
Investment Performance section shows ROI and gain/loss ✅
Smart Alerts unlocked with On/Off toggle ✅
Smart Alerts toggle works correctly (Off -> On) ✅
What Changed expanded view shows Income/Expenses/Invested changes ✅
pricing_page: Data Export removed from premium features list ✅
All other premium features listed correctly ✅
